title: Sylas is pretty lazy design tbh and busted even without the Ultimate.
body:
Passive is basically better Diana passive.
Q is basically Illaoi Q that erupts like a Vel'Koz W.
W is basically an Illaoi W that has a heal and an execute mechanic.
E part 1 is basically an Aatrox E, 2nd part is basically a Nautilus Q.

This guy actually has EVERYTHING in his kit. It's like there was a build-a-bear-style champion workshop at bring your kid to work day and Riot just tacked a moderately-interesting ultimate onto it at the end to make him seem cool and unique.

replies.body:
Neeko Q is similar to lux/zyra/morgana
Neeko W is similar to shaco/leblanc/wukong
Neeko E is similar to lux/zyra/morgana
neeko R is similar to zyra/nunu/morgana

A _lot_ of champions use similar abilities. It's how they work with the rest of their kit, and the small differences they have between them that make abilities unique to that champion. 
Having similar abilities to other champions also makes a new champion easier to pick up, as you already have some idea how to use their abilities without having to relearn something completely new.
We're also at a point where most thing have been done to one degree or another, so reusing basic things that are already on several champions is going to happen. Players would complain even more than they already do if a player had 4 completely unique, never before seen mechanics, as it would be substantially more difficult to balance. New champions usually only have 1 or 2 unique abilities, and that alone makes them balance nightmares.

He doesn't have grievous wounds, he doesn't have suppression, he doesn't have true damage... come to think of it, yes he does, if he steals Kat ult, Malz ult, or Darius ult. He also has a three-hit passive by stealing Jax ult, he has damage immunity with Kayle/Taric ult, he has untargetability by stealing Elise's ult and using Rappel, he has CC immunity by stealing Olaf's ult (and sit on an armor/MR boost until he uses it), healing teammates with Soraka ult, MS boost (and heal) with Mundo ult, global damage with a handful of ults...

When you say he actually has everything in his kit, are we talking with or without the balance nightmare ult?

It’s kinda like saying that this champion has a basic attack, plagiarizing all of the other champs because they also have basic attacks. Or this new champ as a slow, but these champs also have slows on other abilities, therefore this new champ does not have any originality and thus must be purged.
